A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: LFL is paying people to boost this RT rating.  DON'T BE FOOLED.  The Last Jedi is a poorly written film.  Yes\, the FX are great as usual\, but the story is stupid and doesn't follow the previous movie at all.  And Luke Skywalker's character is totally trashed--turned into a deadbeat loser instead of the hero we all know and love.  People hate this movie for good reason.  AVOID.
